description: This file defines a class NewspaperTools that extends Toolkit to provide functionality for extracting article text from URLs using the newspaper3k library.

classes.name: NewspaperTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for fetching article text from URLs using the newspaper3k library.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the NewspaperTools with an option to include the get_article_text method as a tool.

methods.name: get_article_text
methods.description: Fetches and returns the text content of an article from a given URL.
